PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-05662016-06-17,  ,  ,  ECCC,  HC,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding a Toxic Substance to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisOrder Adding a TOXIC SUBSTANCE TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 in order to enable the Minister of the Environment to propose risk management activities under Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999 to manage environmental concerns associated with microbeads.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0150 Publication Date: 2016-06-29
AttachmentsAttachment
